text: “E mmwe Daudi! Chisimu Uwwe tuntesile mmwe kuwa wakulolela pachilambo, basi jilanyani chilikati cha wandu mwa chilungamiko, soni ngasinkuya isako (yantima wenu) itakwisa mwainsokonesye kuleka litala lya Allah. Chisimu awala waakusokonechela kuleka litala lya Allah, akwete kupata wanganyao ilagasyo yaukali nnope ligongo lyakuliwalila kwao Lisiku Lyachiwalanjilo.”
